committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials

official_title: A bill to establish a commission to study defense-related aspects of the United States merchant marine.

summary.as: Reported to House amended, Part II
summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment,H.Rept.98-384(Part II)) Establishes the Commission on Merchant Marine and Defense to study the capability of the U.S. merchant marine to transport cargo necessary to the national defense during a period of war or national emergency and the adequacy of the U.S. shipbuilding mobilization base. Directs the Commission to report to Congress and the President by June 30, 1985, on its findings and conclusions and by September 30, 1985, on its recommendations. Terminates such Commission 90 days after the second report is submitted. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1985 and 1986.

titles.title: A bill to establish a commission to study defense-related aspects of the United States merchant marine.
